orbital_estimation¶

Estimates a space objects state vector from a set of ranges and range-rates.

orbital_estimation.estimate_state(r_meas, rr_meas, p_rx)[source]¶
orbital_estimation.meas2pos(m, p_rx)[source]¶
orbital_estimation.meas2vel(p, m, p_rx, dt=0.1)[source]¶
